txt.en: Deposit supplies in the waggon outside the back gate.

'Excellent. Thank you for your help. We will let the soldiers sleep tonight. Tomorrow, we ride out to meet Bârshud in battle. I do grow weary of war, [placeholder], but nonetheless it has become my ready companion.'
War is Coming to Imhûlar
Speak with Mizâdi in Kûr Anzar.
Train with Subuzûri ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Mizâdi in Kûr Anzar
Gather fallen weapons for the Subuzûri in Kûr Anzar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gather provisions for the waggons going south in Kûr Anzar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'This is an evil I dared not believe exist. We will gather all the supplies and Subuzûri and drive him from Imhûlar. I will not hide behind these walls. I will not subject the people of Kûr Anzar to more bloodshed. We will meet him on the open field.

'I have need of you once more, [placeholder]. We will need to gather weapons and whatever supplies you can find here in Kûr Anzar.

'Oh, there is another messenger here - what do they want? Could you find out, friend?'
Gather supplies for the waggons going south in Kûr Anzar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'This is an evil I dared not believe exist. We will gather all the supplies and Subuzûri and drive him from Imhûlar. I will not hide behind these walls. I will not subject the people of Kûr Anzar to more bloodshed. We will meet him on the open field.

I have need of you once more, [placeholder]. I will meet him in southern Imhûlar. We will need to gather weapons and whatever supplies you can find here in Kûr Anzar. 

Oh, there is another messenger here - what do they want? Could you see, friend?
'Please, give this message to the Shâra. There is word from Khûd Zagin. Amalíbi requests aid against a great many Ordâkhai excursions - we are being overrun!'
Deposit supplies in the waggon outside the back gate
Nimasi is a traitor to Mizâdi, leading you right into Bârshud's trap. You should now aid Mizâdi in preparing for battle with Bârshud.

'I cannot think to provide aid now - our troubles are numerous as well. Tell her to tell Amalíbi we cannot aid them now. Imhûlar needs to look after their own in this moment. We have nothing for greater Shagâna.'
Speak with Mizâdi in Kûr Anzar.
Deliver Amalíbi's message to Mizâdi.
'Please thank the Shâra for seeing me, though Amalíbi will be disappointed in the Shâra's answer. We of the Khûd will look after our own. Apparently Imhûlar will as well.'
Speak with the messenger from Khûd Zagin near the back gate
Speak with Usanâb from Khûd Zagin.
Deliver Amalíbi's message to Mizâdi
Speak with the messenger from Khûd Zagin near the back gate.
Deliver Usanâb's final message to Mizâdi in Kûr Anzar.
Speak with Usanâb from Khûd Zagin
Gathered provisions for the waggons going south ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver Usanâb's final message to Mizâdi in Kûr Anzar
Speak with Mizâdi in Kûr Anzar
Train with Subuzûri to test their mettle.
Gather fallen weapons for the Subuzûri and provisions for the waggons going south from around Kûr Anzar.
Gather supplies for the waggons going south from around Kûr Anzar.
Trained with Subuzûri ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Anything in the Khûd will have to wait. We need to get the Subuzûri all the weapons we can find and the waggons loaded with supplies for heading south. If this Bârshud wants war, he shall have it.'
Gathered fallen weapons for the Subuzûri ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gathered supplies for the waggons going south ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
